WorkItem.Description:
Hi
It seems there is some issues with asp.net 5.
I install the htmlagility pack from the nugget source.
Some of methods has error so I can not build my project but it works when I try the view in browser option!!!
it seems there is some problem with core :

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line
Error	CS1503	Argument 1: cannot convert from 'string' to 'System.IO.Stream'	InfoBay.ASP.NET Core 5.0	D:\ToDoProjects\InfoX\InfoBay\Framework\Helpers_Html.cs	52

this error occurred on this line :
                HtmlDocument hd = new HtmlDocument();
                this line has error : hd.Save(fp, System.Text.Encoding.Unicode);

Have you ever try to run html agility pack with asp.net 5?
Please let me know if there is a solution.
Thanks
Mohsen
